com.revature.screenforce.controllers

Class QuestionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.screenforce.controllers.QuestionController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/question")
public class QuestionController
extends Object
    Controller that handles mapping for all of the methods for question manipulation
    Author:

        @GetMapping(value="/getByBucket/{bucketId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Question>> getBucketQuestions(@PathVariable(value="bucketId")
                                                                                                                                int bucketId)
        Find all questions associated with a specific bucket
        Parameters:
        bucketId - Id of bucket to filter by
        Returns:
        List of questions associated with bucket of given id For the getByBucket method, it should be done using a params. rather than an endpoint.
